title: First Harvest
description: Learn the farming cycle: plant, wait, and harvest

phases.title: The Farming Buttons
phases.description: Learn about the Plant and Harvest buttons

preDialogues.name: Maru
preDialogues.content: Alright! See those buttons in the lower-right corner? Those are your PLANT and HARVEST buttons.

preDialogues.name: Maru
preDialogues.content: Exactly! Stand on farmland, click PLANT to plant wheat. Wait for it to grow. Then click HARVEST when it's ready.

phases.title: Planting Your First Crop
phases.description: Use the Plant button to plant wheat

preDialogues.name: Maru
preDialogues.content: Go ahead - walk to one of the brown farmland tiles and click the PLANT button!

objectives.description: Click the PLANT button on farmland
Click the PLANT button on farmland

postDialogues.name: Maru
postDialogues.content: Now we wait! Watch the farmland - it'll grow over time. You'll see it change!

phases.title: Reaping the Rewards
phases.description: Wait for the wheat to grow, then harvest it

preDialogues.name: Maru
preDialogues.content: Now we wait! Watch the farmland - it'll grow over time. When it's fully grown, click the HARVEST button while standing on it!

preDialogues.name: Qubit
preDialogues.content: This is going to take forever if I have to watch every single plant grow...

preDialogues.name: Maru
preDialogues.content: Oh, you have NO idea what we have planned. But first - let's finish this harvest!

objectives.description: Wait for wheat to grow, then click HARVEST
Wait for wheat to grow, then click HARVEST

postDialogues.name: Qubit
postDialogues.content: I see the wheat counter went up. So that's how we measure success here?

postDialogues.name: Maru
postDialogues.content: Exactly! Wheat is our currency. The more you grow, the more you can upgrade and improve.

postDialogues.name: Qubit
postDialogues.content: Okay, but seriously - clicking buttons for every plant? That's not going to scale.

postDialogues.name: Maru
postDialogues.content: Aha! NOW you're thinking! Come on, let me show you something cool...
